title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21ยง 1.12 - Replacement of lost license, permit or registration card
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21ยง 1.12 - Replacement of lost license, permit or registration card

State Regulations
A licensee, registrant or permittee who has lost his license, registration card or permit, after identifying himself to the satisfaction of
the commission, shall be issued a temporary license, registration card or
permit, valid for a period of not more than 30 days. He shall also submit a
sworn application for replacement of his lost license, registration card or
permit and, upon his payment of a replacement charge of $15, the commission
shall issue to him a new license, registration card or
permit. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21ยง
1.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
